page.title: 11OSSETT SHOPPING PRECINCT
page.content: People were asked what they thought of Ossett as a shopping centre.Most people think it is alright for food shops but there are not enough menswear shops. People thought the Ossett precinct which is pedestrianised was a good idea.Since the cars had been removed shopping was much better and safer.People think that now there is a new ringroad Ossett is a much safer place to shop in. People in Ossett thought there there were enough parks in Ossett but they were not in very good condition because of graffiti and vandalism.Litter is another problem people were not using the bins provided.Older people wanted more seats to rest on.
